text: Vappu Salonen (12 February 1929 - 9 July 2017) was a Finnish gymnast. She competed in seven events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Finnish female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Finland Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts from Tampere
title: Vappu Salonen
